import React from 'react'; import profile from '../images/profile.svg' import { Link, withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import { connect } from "unistore/react"; import { actions, store } from "../store/store"; const ProfilList = (props) => { return( {/*

props.afterLogOut()}>

*/}

User
props.afterLogOut()} style={{color:'black'}}> Logout
) } export default connect('', actions)(withRouter(ProfilList))
